item.title: Meta Moments
item.description: ‚ùñ This image was a gift to my friend Bez. Thank you Bez. Archived from the original article here a.book-btn:hover { filter: brightness(85%); } Occasionally I’ll join an “art trade” to change things up and break the repetition of working in one universe with one set of characters. Bez is a friend of mine and a talented artist, and so for Christmas we decided to produce secret works involving characters and places we don’t usually draw.
